dict.acceptation: 冠军；捍卫者，拥护者；战士；

sent.orig: A former Champion himself, JBL was hell-bent on defeating Batista and becoming World Champion once again.
sent.trans: 一位前冠军本人，jbl是死心塌地打败巴蒂斯塔，并成为世界冠军再次重演。

sent.orig: Top seed Ardy, world silver medallist Susanto, Olympic champion Kusuma and defending champion Arbi.
sent.trans: 他们是头呈种子阿迪，世界亚军苏桑托，奥运会冠军库苏马和全英比赛的卫冕冠军阿尔比。

sent.orig: Asian champion Wang Yang Kuaiqi hope that the great Games Chilean Kuaiqi crowned champion.
sent.trans: 亚洲快棋冠军汪洋极大希望加冕智运会快棋冠军。

sent.orig: You have the undisputed middleweight champion and the undisputed junior middleweight champion bumping heads.
sent.trans: 你们拥有无可争议的中量级冠军和无可争议的次中量级冠军大碰撞。

sent.orig: Top seed Ardy, world silver medalist Susan to, Olympic champion Ku Suma and defending champion Arbi.
sent.trans: 他们是头号种子阿迪，世界亚军苏桑托，奥运会冠军库苏马和全英比赛的卫冕冠军阿尔比。
